{{Quote|You Forresters have shit on us for generations. Well now the Starks are no longer around to have your back, are they? We're the power in the North now.|Ludd Whitehill to [[Ethan Forrester]]|Iron From Ice}}
'''Ludd Whitehill''' is the reigning Lord of Highpoint and the head of [[HouseÂ Whitehill|House&nbsp;Whitehill]].
sections.Biography:
===Background===
==="[[Iron From Ice]]"===
Ludd Whitehill and the men under his commanded aided their Bolton overlord in carrying out the [[Red Wedding]] - massacring men from other Northern houses during the slaughter - particularly those from House Forrester.

Following [[Roose Bolton]]'s ascension as Warden of the North, Ludd continued to serve faithfully by aiding his bastard son, [[Ramsay Bolton|Ramsay Snow]] in assuring the loyalty of the Forresters.
